attributes.additional_details:
Royal Bolton Hospital's A&E Department has been threatened with closure. The general consensus is that the hospital is also under threat of closure with the potential of over 5000 staff losses.
Please help save this award winning lifeline to our community, it could be your hospital next and consider what you would do if you had to travel long distances to visit a sick relative?
Please, do what you can, and sign this e-petition.
